main_definition: Breakfast is the first meal of the day, typically eaten in the morning after waking up.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Actual physical meal consumed in the early part of the day
meanings_and_examples.example: I had pancakes and eggs for breakfast this morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An event or gathering where people eat a morning meal together
meanings_and_examples.example: We're having a breakfast meeting at 8 am to discuss the new project.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Start of something, as in 'beginning my day with a good breakfast'
meanings_and_examples.example: Taking care of yourself and starting your day right begins with having a nutritious breakfast.
